content.question: Block <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></math> of mass <math alttext="m" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is moving with speed <math alttext="v" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>υ</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> to the right on a horizontal surface of negligible friction, as shown in the figure. Block <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></math> makes an elastic, head-on collision with block <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></math> of mass <math alttext="2 m " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, which is at rest.
